<MethodEndpoint
  method={"post"}
  path={"/api/v1/chat/"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>

Send a message to the bot and get a response. Returns 201 if a new chat is created, 200 if using an existing chat.

  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

  parameters={undefined}
>

>
  
</RequestSchema>
